trans-unit.source: Defines the method that glyph provider classes use to generate an array of glyphs to display on an activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Definisce il metodo che le classi di provider di glifi utilizzano per generare una matrice di icone da visualizzare in un ActivityDesigner.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] This interface defines the method that implementing classes must use to provide an appropriate set of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph> objects to activity designers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Questa interfaccia definisce il metodo di implementazione di classi deve utilizzare per fornire un set appropriato di <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph>oggetti ActivityDesigner.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph>

trans-unit.source: The implementing class should also render the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph> objects onto the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> object.
trans-unit.target: La classe di implementazione deve anche eseguire il rendering di <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph>gli oggetti di <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>oggetto.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph>

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of glyphs that are associated with the specified activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce una matrice di glifi associati all'ActivityDesigner specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> object for which to retrieve the glyphs.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> oggetto per cui recuperare le icone.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph"></xref> objects to render to the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph"> </xref> oggetti per eseguire il rendering all'ActivityDesigner.
